voice.s: It is important to note that Kanji characters can have multiple pronunciations and meanings depending on the context in which they are used. For example:日 (sun) is pronounced as ひ (hi)日 (day) is pronounced as にち (nichi)今日 (today) is pronounced as きょう (kyou)三日 (the third day of the month) is pronounced as みっか (mikka)
